item.title: ID-36 West at ID-34 - Franklin County
item.description: ID-36 West at ID-34 in Franklin County. Turn right for ID-34 North; turn left for ID-34 South/ID-36 West. Notice the the old and new varieties of Idaho state highway markers (ID-34 North - New, ID-34 South/ID-36 West - Old).

item.title: ID-36 West at ID-34 - Franklin County
item.description: ID-36 West at ID-34 in Franklin County. Use ID-34 North to Grace; ID-34 South/ID-36 West to Preston and Logan (Utah).

item.title: ID-36 West Approaching ID-34
item.description: ID-36 West approaching ID-34 in Franklin County. ID-36 West joins ID-34 south to Preston.

item.title: End ID-34 South at ID-36/US-91 - Preston
item.description: End ID-34 South at ID-36/US-91 in Preston. Turn right for US-91 north to Pocatello; left for US-91 South/ID-34 West to (Preston) City Center/Logan (Utah).

item.title: ID-34 South/ID-36 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-34 South/ID-36 East. Distance to Preston, Logan (Utah - via US-91), and Malad (via ID-36).

item.title: ID-34 South at ID-36
item.description: ID-34 South at ID-36 in Franklin County. Turn left for ID-36 East; continue straight for ID-34 South/ID-36 West.

item.title: ID-34 South at ID-36
item.description: ID-34 South at ID-36 East to Montpelier. Continue south on ID-34 South/ID-36 West to Preston and Logan (Utah).

item.title: ID-34 South Approaching ID-36
item.description: ID-34 South approaching ID-36 in Franklin County. ID-34 south joins ID-36 west to Preston.

item.title: ID-34 South - ID-36 East Truck Information
item.description: ID-34 south approaching ID-36. Truck information for ID-36 east traffic.

item.title: ID-34 South - Grace
item.description: Entering Grace on ID-34 south.

item.title: ID-34 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-34 south. Distance to Grace, Preston, and Logan (Utah).

item.title: ID-34 South - Pioneer Historic Byway
item.description: ID-34 South/Pioneer Historic Byway in Caribou County.

item.title: US-30 East at ID-34
item.description: US-30 east at ID-34 in Caribou County.

item.title: US-30 East Approaching ID-34
item.description: US-30 East approaching ID-34 south to Grace. Continue east on US-30 for Soda Springs and Montpelier. ID-34 north joins US-30 eastbound to Soda Springs.

item.title: US-30 East/ID-34 North at US-30/ID-34 Split
item.description: US-30 East/ID-34 North at US-30/ID-34 split in Soda Springs. Turn left to continue north on ID-34. The ID-34 shield pictured here is the new style of Idaho state highway shield.

item.title: US-30 East/ID-34 North Approaching US-30/ID-34 Split
item.description: US-30 East/ID-34 North approaching US-30/ID-34 split in Soda Springs. Turn left for ID-34 north to Wayan and Jackson (Wyoming). Continue east on US-30 for Georgetown and Montpelier.

item.title: US-30 East/ID-34 North - Soda Springs
item.description: US-30 East/ID-34 North approaching US-30/ID-34 split in Soda Springs.

item.title: US-30 East/ID-34 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-30 East/ID-34 North. Distance to Soda Springs, Georgetown, and Montpelier.

item.title: US-30 East Approaching ID-34
item.description: US-30 East approaching ID-34 in Caribou County. ID-34 joins US-30 eastbound into Soda Springs.

item.title: US-30 West/ID-34 South - Distance Marker
item.description: US-30 West/ID-34 South Distance Marker. Distance to Lava Hot Springs, Grace, Pocatello.

item.title: ID-34 South at US-30
item.description: ID-34 South at US-30. Turn left for US-30 west to Montpelier. Turn right for US-30 east to Pocatello and ID-34 south to Preston.

item.title: ID-34 South Approaching US-30
item.description: ID-34 South approaching US-30 in Soda Springs. ID-34 south joins US-30 east through Soda Springs.

item.title: ID-34 South - Soda Springs
item.description: ID-34 south (East Hooper Ave.) at S. 3rd St. Turn left to continue south on ID-34.

item.title: ID-34 South - Soda Springs
item.description: Entering Soda Springs on ID-34 south. Population 3058. Soda Springs is the county seat of Caribou County.

item.title: ID-34 South - Caribou County
item.description: ID-34 South in Caribou County. The shield is brown because it is part of the scenic/historic byway system, in this case the Pioneer Historic Byway.

item.title: ID-34 South - Conda Jct.
item.description: ID-34 south at Conda Jct.

item.title: ID-34 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-34 south. Distance to Conda Jct., Soda Springs, and Preston.

item.title: ID-34 South - Grays Lake Road Jct.
item.description: ID-34 South at Grays Lake Road Jct. Turn right for Grays Lake National Wildlife Refuge.

item.title: ID-34 South - Gray
item.description: ID-34 south at Grays Lake Road north to Gray.

item.title: ID-34 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-34 south. Distance to Henry, Conda, and Soda Springs.

item.title: ID-34 South - Wayan
item.description: Entering Wayan on ID-34 south.

item.title: Stateline Road North at ID-34
item.description: Stateline Road north at ID-34 south. ID-34 is part of the Pioneer Historic Byway.

item.title: End WY-239 at Stateline Road
item.description: Turn right on Stateline Road to access ID-34 to Soda Springs and Wayan (both in Idaho). This sign assembly appears to have been erected by the Idaho Transportation Department. The west side of Stateline Road is in Idaho.

item.title: US-30 West at ID-34
item.description: US-30 west at ID-34 north to Wayan and Jackson. ID-34 joins US-30 west through Soda Springs towards McCammon and Pocatello.

item.title: US-30 West at ID-34
item.description: US-30 west at ID-34 in Soda Springs. Turn right on ID-34 north for Afton and Jackson (both in Wyoming). ID-34 joins US-30 west through Soda Springs. Continue west on US-30/ID-34 for McCammon and Pocatello. ID-34 is part of the Pioneer Historic Byway, which is why the shield is a brown color.

item.title: ID-34/ID-36 East at Split
item.description: ID-34/ID-36 east at ID-34/ID-36 split. ID-34 is signed as the Pioneer Historic Byway.

item.title: ID-34/ID-36 East Approaching Split
item.description: ID-34/ID-36 east approaching ID-34/ID-36 split. Use ID-36 east for Montpelier. Continue on ID-34 east for Grace and Soda Springs.

item.title: ID-34/ID-36 East Approaching Split
item.description: ID-34/ID-36 east approaching ID-34/ID-36 split. ID-34 is signed as the Pioneer Historic Byway.

item.title: ID-34/ID-36 East - Restricted Truck Route on ID-36
item.description: Restricted Truck Route on ID-36 on ID-34/ID-36 east.

item.title: ID-34/ID-36 East Approaching ID-36
item.description: ID-34/ID-36 east approaching ID-36 east to Montpelier.

item.title: ID-34 North/ID-36 East - Bear Lake Rec. Area
item.description: ID-34 North/ID-36 East approaching ID-36. Use ID-36 East for the Bear Lake Recreation Area.

item.title: ID-34 North/ID-36 East
item.description: ID-34 North/ID-36 east in Preston. ID-34 is signed as the Pioneer Historic Byway.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East at ID-34/ID-36
item.description: US-91 north/ID-36 east at ID-34/ID-36. ID-36 leaves US-91 here, as well as the Pioneer Historic Byway.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East at ID-34/ID-36
item.description: US-91 north/ID-36 east at ID-34/ID-36. Use US-91 north for Pocatello. Use ID-34 North/ID-36 east for Soda Springs and Montepelier.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East Approaching ID-34/ID-36
item.description: US-91 North/ID-36 east approaching ID-34/ID-36 jct. This is the beginning of ID-34 north. The Pioneer Historic Byway leaves US-91 and joins ID-34 north.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East Approaching ID-34
item.description: US-91 North/ID-36 East approaching ID-34 north. Use left lanes to continue on US-91 north.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East Approaching ID-34
item.description: US-91 North/ID-36 East approaching ID-34. The Pioneer Historic Byway leaves US-91 here and continues along ID-34.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East - ID-34 Jct.
item.description: US-91 north/ID-36 east approaching ID-34

item.title: US-91 North at ID-36
item.description: US-91 north at ID-36 west. Use ID-36 west for Dayton. ID-36 east joins US-91 north through Preston. Continue on US-91 North/ID-36 east for Pocatello, Soda Springs, and ID-34 junction.

item.title: US-30 West/ID-34 South At ID-34
item.description: US-30 West/ID-34 South at ID-34. Turn left for ID-34 south to Grace; turn right on county road to Bancroft. Continue straight ahead for US-30 west to Pocatello.

item.title: US-30 East/ID-34 South Approaching ID-34
item.description: US-30 East/ID-34 South approaching US-30/ID-34 split in Bannock County.

item.title: ID-34 South - Soda Springs
item.description: ID-34 south (East Hooper Ave.) at North 3rd St. Turn left to continue south on ID-34.

item.title: ID-34 South - Pioneer Historic Byway
item.description: ID-34 south in Caribou County - Pioneer Historic Byway.

item.title: End WY-239 at Stateline Road - To ID-34
item.description: End WY-239 at Stateline Road. Turn right on Stateline Road to ID-34, Wayan, and Soda Springs.

item.title: US-91 North at ID-34/ID-36
item.description: ID-34/ID-36 Right Lane Sign Approaching US-91/ID-36/ID-34 Junction, on US-91/ID-

item.title: US-91/ID-36 North at ID-34/ID-36
item.description: ID-34/ID-36/US-91 Junction to Pocatello, Soda Springs and Montpelier on US-91 N

item.title: US-91/ID-36 North at ID-34/ID-36
item.description: US-91/ID-36/ID-34 Junction on US-91 North

item.title: ID-34 South - Scenic Byways
item.description: ID-34 Shield, Bear Lake-Caribou Scenic Byway, and Pioneer Historic Byway. Taken at the Idaho/Wyoming Border in the Star Valley.

item.title: ID-36 West/ID-34 South - Pioneer Historic Byway
item.description: Pioneer Historic Byway/ID-34/ID-36 on ID-36 West at the Bear River.
